explains: v. 呼（气），呼出；散发出（蒸气，烟雾）

sentences.en: Without gravity to help circulate air, the carbon dioxide you exhale has a tendency to form an invisible cloud around your head.
sentences.cn: 如果没有重力帮助空气循环，你呼出的二氧化碳会在你头顶周围形成一个看不见的云状物。

sentences.en: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 当肺呼出这股废气，气体就被排到空气中。

sentences.en: Generally, you exhale on the effort, if doing weights, karate or boxing, and inhale on the return.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，如果你在做举重、空手道或拳击等运动用力时，你会呼气，然后吸气。
